messages.content: Was ist der Beste Einstieg in Black Desert Online in 2025?

The "best" starting class in Black Desert Online (BDO) for 2025 depends on your individual playstyle, goals (PvE vs. PvP), and desired level of complexity [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-0) [mein-mmo](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-1) [skycoach](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-2]. Given the recent release of the Wukong class on July 2, 2025 [blackdesertfoundry](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-0), and the combat system overhaul expected in August 2025 [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-3), it's important to consider both current recommendations and upcoming changes.

**General Recommendations for Beginners:**

Several classes are recommended for beginners [mein-mmo](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-7) [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-8):

*   **Giant:** This class is a melee fighter that is easy to learn and can quickly eliminate enemies [mein-mmo](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-1).
*   **Guardian:** Considered beginner-friendly due to its low APM (actions per minute) and large AoEs (area of effect) [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-0) [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-10). Succession Guardian is also considered A-Tier due to impressive damage output [garmoth](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-12).
*   **Valkyrie:** Another good option for beginners [mein-mmo](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-1), though Warrior is probably more beginner friendly [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-8).
*   **Maegu:** Succession Maegu is recommended as fun, smooth, and easy to play [reddit](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-6) [reddit](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-9).
*   **Woosa:** Also recommended for beginners [mein-mmo](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-1).
*   **Witch/Wizard:** Awakening Witch is considered solid and easy to play [reddit](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-6) [reddit](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-9].
*   **Berserker:** Considered a very beginner-friendly class with a strong kit for both PvE and PvP [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-0).
*   **Ranger:** Easy to learn but hard to master [mein-mmo](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-4) [mein-mmo](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-7).
*   **Deadeye:** Also recommended for beginners [mein-mmo](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-7).

The Black Mage and Tamer are particularly difficult for newcomers [mein-mmo](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-4) [mein-mmo](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-7].

**Impact of Upcoming Combat Changes:**

The combat system overhaul in August 2025 [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-3) will introduce significant changes, including the removal of resistances in PvP, simplified class-to-class ratios, and adjustments to the monster AP formula [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-3). Classes will be divided into ward/defense/guard, rush, and fierce assault/onslaught subcategories, with damage modifiers based on these groupings [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-3]. These changes may shift the balance of power between classes, so it's wise to choose a class that is fundamentally enjoyable to play, rather than solely based on current tier lists.

**Recommendations:**

1.  **Consider the Wukong Class:** As a newly released class, Wukong [blackdesertfoundry](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-0) might be a fun option, but be aware that its balance and optimal playstyle are still being discovered.
2.  **Try Class Trials:** Utilize the class trial system to test different classes before committing [lagofast](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-3].
3.  **Focus on Enjoyment:** Ultimately, the best class is one that you enjoy playing [skycoach](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/0-2) [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-1) [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-5).
4.  **Consider Season Servers:** When starting the game, create a season character to access special servers that provide major boosts in experience and rewards [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-1) [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-2]. New adventurers should use the Season-1 (Novice only) server for progression benefits [playblackdesert](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-3].

Given the impending combat changes, focusing on beginner-friendly classes with straightforward mechanics like Guardian, Berserker, or Maegu might be a good approach. These classes offer a solid foundation for learning the game while you adapt to the upcoming balance adjustments.

search_query: Black Desert Online best starting class 2025
What are the expected class balance changes or new class releases in Black Desert Online leading up to 2025 that might affect the best starting class choice?

**Classes by Play Style:**

**Important Considerations:**

Okay, I will conduct Google Searches to gather the most recent information on "Black Desert Online beginner's guide 2025" and synthesize it into a verifiable text artifact.
Black Desert Online (BDO) is a massive open-world MMORPG known for its visuals, character customization, and complex systems [1v9](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0). Starting can feel overwhelming, so here's a guide for beginners in 2025 [1v9](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0) [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-1).

**Character Creation and Season Servers**

*   When starting the game, create a season character to access special servers that provide major boosts in experience and rewards [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-1) [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-2).
*   New adventurers should use the Season-1 (Novice only) server for progression benefits [playblackdesert](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-3).
*   It doesn't matter which server you select, as you can freely switch between servers, excluding season servers [playblackdesert](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-3).
*   You can have multiple characters [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-2). Having multiple characters can be beneficial, even if you mainly play one, as they can function as energy batteries or be placed at different locations for bosses or life skills [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-2).
*   If you are playing Black Desert for the first time, it is recommended that you start at the Ancient Stone Chamber to experience the full storyline, and for faster progression [playblackdesert](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-3).

**Choosing a Class**

*   Black Desert offers a dynamic and combo-heavy combat system [mein-mmo](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-4).
*   Consider classes suitable for beginners: Giant, Gardia, Valkyrie, Maegu, Wusa, Sorceress, Ranger, Deadeye [mein-mmo](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-4).
*   The Ranger is easy to learn but hard to master [mein-mmo](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-4).
*   The classes Black Mage and Tamer are particularly difficult for newcomers [mein-mmo](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-4).
*   Classes like Berserker/Giant, Striker, Sage, Woosa, Maegu, Witch, and Wizard are also recommended for new players [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-5).
*   Awakening Sorceress, Warrior Succession, Ninja Succession, Witch Succession, and Lahn Succession are considered some of the best classes in the game [skycoach](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-6).
*   Consider the Guardian class, which is beginner-friendly with low APM and big AoE [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-7).
*   Ultimately, choose a class that appeals to your combat style, as every class can perform well if you learn how to play it [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-1) [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-5).

**Gear Progression**

*   Enhancing gear is a core part of progression [1v9](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0).
*   Enhance the Naru gear you obtain from the main questline to PEN (V) [playblackdesert](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-3).
*   The main story quests will reward you with Naru gear, which you can enhance to PEN with beginner black stones [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-8).
*   After enhancing Naru gear to PEN, you can exchange it for PRI Tuvala gear [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-1).
*   Make sure your armors, weapons, and accessories are at PEN Tuvala before graduating from the season [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-1).
*   You will keep your Tuvala gear and use them to upgrade to better items [blackdesertfoundry](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-9).
*   You'll get a Frozen Tide Black Stone that will essentially allow you to get a free Tuvala to a PEN Tuvala for your armors and accessories [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-1).
*   The game will give you a PEN Tuvala ring and earring for completing the season pass [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-8).
*   After graduating from season, you can exchange your PEN Tuvala gear for TET boss gear [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-10).
*   Enhance boss armors with Caphras stones, leveling each piece to level 10 [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-10).
*   Obtain the corresponding flame for each boss armor to convert your boss gear into a slumbering origin armor piece [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-10).

**Essential Beginner Tips**

*   Follow the Main Quest Line (Black Spirit Quests) [1v9](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0).
*   Join a guild early for daily payouts, buffs, and access to guild missions [1v9](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0).
*   Manage your inventory and storage by storing excess items in city storage [1v9](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0).
*   Understand Nodes and Workers to generate passive income [1v9](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0).
*   Manage Energy and Contribution Points wisely [1v9](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0).
*   Enhance Your Gear Carefully [1v9](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0).
*   Don't compare your gear to others [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-2).
*   Don't rush to endgame; work at your own pace [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-2).

**Leveling**

*   To level up fast, do the main story quest line [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-1).
*   You can choose the path you want to go down, such as the ancient stone chamber path [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-1).
*   Talk to all NPCs in the game to gain knowledge, which will increase your energy pool [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-1).
*   If you don't want to do the main story line, you can start grinding [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-1).
*   For fast solo leveling, start at Brellin Farm and do all the quests [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-11).
*   If you are questing without grinding, you're going to need the Chenga Sheriken Tomb of Wisdom, which allows you to gain combat XP through quest rewards [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-11).

**Other Activities**

*   Explore life skills such as fishing, cooking, alchemy, processing, training, farming, and bartering [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-10).
*   Consider doing weekly bosses for high-value rewards [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-12).
*   Do the weeklies for your infinite potions [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-12).
*   Set up nodes and workers early [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-12).

This guide synthesizes information to help new players navigate Black Desert Online in 2025 [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-1) [1v9](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0).
As of July 16, 2025, here's a breakdown of expected class balance changes, new class releases, and how they might affect the best starting class choice in Black Desert Online:

**New Class Releases**

*   **Wukong:** The descendant of the legendary warrior who rides the clouds and swings the Ruyi Jingu Bang, 'Wukong', was released on July 2, 2025 [blackdesertfoundry](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-0). Wukong is an ascension class like Archer, Deadeye and Scholar [reddit](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-1) [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-2). He uses the Power Pole as a main weapon, and an awakening weapon in the Jade Pillar [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-2).

**Class Balance Changes**

*   **Combat System Overhaul:** A complete combat system overhaul is expected to arrive sometime in August 2025 [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-3). Resistances in PvP are going away, class-to-class ratios are being simplified, mouse to move in PvE and PvP is being disabled, grapples are getting a windup or visual effect, and the monster AP formula will be changing [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-3).
*   **Damage Rework:** Class damage ratios are being simplified to 89.29% [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-3) [blackdesertfoundry](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-4). PvP damage for some classes will be adjusted to maintain current PvP damage [blackdesertfoundry](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-4). For example, Dark Knight's PvP damage will increase by 2.5% [blackdesertfoundry](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-4) [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-3).
*   **Skill Addons:** Extra damage against monsters increase value in the skill addon has been moved to the Bonus Monster AP section [blackdesertfoundry](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-4). The Extra Damage Against Humans is only applied to monsters, and the buff applied during PvP has been changed to 'Extra Damage Against Adventurers', so the additional damage effect for humans from skill addons has also been removed [blackdesertfoundry](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-4).
*   **Monster AP and Zones:** Players now get a monster AP plus 8 bonus for every one sheet AP they have over 310 attack power [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-3). Monster Zone AP soft caps have also been updated [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-3).
*   **Class Grouping:** Classes will be divided into three subcategories: ward/defense/guard, rush, and fierce assault/onslaught [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-3). Ward classes deal 5% more damage to onslaught classes, rush classes deal 5% more damage to ward classes, and onslaught classes deal 5% more damage to rush classes [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-3).
*   **Other Recent Class Changes:**
    *   Wizard and Witch: Magic Lighthouse boosts max MP and MP recovery enhanced PvE capabilities of both classes [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-5).
    *   Ranger: Got cooldown reduction [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-5).
    *   Woosa: Succession got damage changes. Awakening probably feels like an entirely different class now [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-6).
    *   Musa: A lot of skills from Musa got buffed [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-6).
    *   Dark Knight: Awakening getting nerfed [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-6).

**Best Starting Classes**

*   Several classes are recommended for beginners [mein-mmo](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-7) [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-8):
    *   Giant
    *   Gardia
    *   Valkyrie
    *   Maegu
    *   Wusa
    *   Sorceress
    *   Ranger
    *   Deadeye
*   The Black Mage and Tamer are particularly difficult for newcomers [mein-mmo](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-7).
*   Succession Maegu is easy to play [reddit](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-9).
*   Awakening Witch is solid and very easy to play [reddit](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-9).
*   Warrior is probably more beginner friendly than Valkyrie [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-8).
*   Guardian is a very beginner friendly class because it's low APM [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-10).

**Classes Tier List**

*   Here is a PvE tier list [skycoach](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-11) [garmoth](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-12):
    *   *S Tier:* Witch Succession, Sage Awakening, Witch Awakening, Wizard Awakening, Mystic Succession, Ninja Succession, Musa Awakening, Sorceress Succession, Mystic Awakening, Maegu Awakening
    *   *A Tier:* Dosa Awakening, Hashashin Succession, Scholar Ascension, Striker Awakening, Ranger Awakening, Lahn Awakening, Lahn Succession, Sorceress Awakening, Guardian Succession, Woosa Awakening, Wizard Succession, Dosa Succession
*   Here is a PvP tier list [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-13):
    *   Succession Kunoichi, Striker Awakening, Awakening Mystic, Succession Berserker, Tamer Awakening, Hashashin Awakening.

**NOTE:** Class balance is subject to change, and personal playstyle preference should be a significant factor in choosing a class [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-8) [blackdesertfoundry](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-4).
